message_template: Rate limit exceeded for {{limitingWindow}} window. You have made {{currentCount}} requests out of {{limit}} allowed. Please wait {{retryAfter}} seconds before retrying. Contact {{contactEmail}} for assistance.
description: Message displayed when a client exceeds rate limits

message_template: Access denied. Your IP address ({{clientIP}}) has been blocked. If you believe this is an error please contact {{contactEmail}}.
description: Message displayed when an IP is on the blocklist

message_template: Unauthorized request. Invalid or missing API key. Please provide a valid X-API-Key header. Contact {{contactEmail}} for API access.
description: Message displayed when API key is invalid or missing

message_template: Access denied. This endpoint requires {{requiredTier}} tier or higher. Your current tier is {{yourTier}}. Contact {{contactEmail}} to upgrade your account.
description: Message displayed when a client tries to access a tier-restricted endpoint
